tag.description: Renders a table based on p:dataTable with PagedDataModel. Each item is available by #{item}.

attribute.description: The id of the p:dataTable. Will also be used as widgetVar name.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Data model must be an instance of PagedDataModel.
attribute.name: value

tag.description: Renders a column based on p:column for op:dataTable. Each item is available by #{item}.

attribute.description: The field (property) name of the #{item} representing the column value. By default, this is used in id, field, headerText, value and filterBy attributes of p:column.
attribute.name: field

attribute.description: The column header text. Defaults to field. By default, this is used in headerText attribute of p:column.
attribute.name: head

attribute.description: The column cell tooltip. Defaults to nothing.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: Whether the column is sortable. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: sortable

attribute.description: Whether to sort column descending on first click. Defaults to false. This is ignored when sortable=false.
attribute.name: sortDescending

attribute.description: Whether the column is filterable. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: filterable

attribute.description: The filter mode of the field. Supported values are "contains", "startsWith", "endsWith", "exact", "none". Defaults to "contains" when filterOptions=null, else "exact". This is ignored when filterable=false.
attribute.name: filterMode

attribute.description: The filter options of the field. Supported values are Object[], Collection and Map. This is ignored when filterable=false.
attribute.name: filterOptions
